articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Hamilton: Ferrari F1 move wouldn't have happened without Vasseur - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has confirmed that his move to the Ferrari Formula 1 team in 2025 wouldn’t have happened without the presence of team principal Fred Vasseur.
articles.content: Hamilton drove for the Frenchmans ASM F3 team in 2005, winning the European title. The following year he graduated to GP2 with Vasseurs rebranded ART GP outfit, again winning the championship, before… [+4124 chars]
